website_summaries.verdict: An excellent upgrade from a basic, smaller showerhead and you won't be disappointed.
pros: Infinitely adjustable water streams, built to last, and the price is reasonable
cons: It is a low-flow shower head, but the company includes instructions on how to remove the flow regulator

customer_reviews.title: Expensive solid construction with decent pressure and coverage
customer_reviews.text: I did a product test between 4 different high pressure shower heads. The 6 function luxury shower head from Aqua Elegante, the Wantba 6" high pressure rainfall massage, the Speakman S-2252 Anystream, and the Delta 75152 single function shower head. Speakman: Pros: Good pressure, solid construction. Decent coverage Cons: It is heavy, so caution required when installing. The adjustable settings doesn't change the stream significantly and it is far pricier to comparable shower heads Get this if: you care about an all metal construction and want a high pressure shower and don't mind spending the money
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Tasteful, compact shower head with several built in streams
customer_reviews.text: Smooth, fluid motion via the handle gives a fair variation in streams. Pressure seems great, you may not even need to remove the flow restrictor though I am adding a photo showing what it looks like Inside the back of the head you will see a black O ring. That is the restrictor. You can remove just this and then have the option of re-installing it later or completely remove all the white plastic inside for maximum flow but no option to restrict it again later
customer_reviews.author: Rx

customer_reviews.title: OH, JOY!
customer_reviews.text: It took me about 10 minutes to install this WONDERFUL shower head. The first 5 minutes involved me trying to locate my adjustable wrench, which turned out to be just a little too small...so I used a channel wrench. After that, it was easy. As for the shower head, it is the best I've ever had. Fully adjustable from flood to fine. I have kinky, thick hair, and rinsing out shampoo is a breeze. Well worth the money. They recommend using a wax to protect the chrome from spotting. I used FLITZ (available on Amazon), and water rolls right off. I saved the old shower head -- because if I ever move, the Speakman is going with me!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Cannot adjust direction of shower head
customer_reviews.text: The head is not a very adjustable shower head. This was designed for large showers with a tub. We have a standing shower about 3'x3'. The shower head sprays clear over my wife's head. There is no way to adjust it any lower. Also when washing my body, there is no way to angle the water at the wall and then back when it's time to wash off. The shower head has the ability to make only slight angled adjustments to its spray. If you dont have a shower/tub combo, or a large walk in shower, this shower head will not work well for you. There should be a warning about the very limited adjustability of this shower head.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Solid shower head with easy to adjust spray patterns. Our water is known for being particularly hard and, thus, the individual nozzles on other shower heads regular clog or fill with bits of calcium. When this happens, you have to remove the shower head and either brush out the bits of calcium or soak the head in a solution to dissolve the calcium. With this Speakman shower head, you just temporarily adjust the spray pattern and whatever bits calcium may have been obstructing the nozzles falls out.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Remove Flow Restrictor and then it's a 5 Star Shower Head!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased and installed this based on the great reputation of the Speakman shower head and the reviews about the amazing water pressure. I was underwhelmed by its performance. Read additional reviews that said you needed to remove flow restrictor for max force. I watched several YouTube videos and worked up the courage to give it a try. Very easy. Don't hesitate..just do it! You really don't need all of the tools shown in some tutorials. Just get a long screw and use a drill to screw it into the white plastic thing. Then use pliers to pull the screw out. The white thing will come out too and you will have unrestricted water flow.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Fine Showerhead
customer_reviews.text: Got this Speakman showerhead to replace a very ineffective low flow "gentle rain" showerhead that came with our rental house. I was concerned that perhaps the water pressure in our bathroom/house just wasn't that great, and a new showerhead wouldn't solve the problem, but even with the flow restrictor left in place this Speakman is a huge improvement. I love it, truly. It's a heavyweight piece, and after several months of daily use by two people it still looks and acts like it's brand new Not sure why some reviewers are claiming this isn't a high pressure showerhead ... In my experience there's lots of nice high pressure water action. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MLM ABQ

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't swivel
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I thought I was not doing something properly. The head doesn't swivel at all. Meaning that if your shower arm faces in a direction you don't want, you can't do anything to aim the water coming from your showerhead in a different direction. This seems very odd. The is a circular plastic looking piece around the ball joint and I thought maybe it was supposed to be removed but after reading every word of the installation instructions, I couldn't find any mention of it and decided not to risk ruining the showerhead. I am still trying to decide whether to keep it or return.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but the inner cover fell off
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shower head with 360 degree head adjustment. Love Speakman and recommend to all my friends. Only issue is that the inner cover fell off after a couple months. It just has a mild adhesive and it seems to have succumbed to moisture. Imagine that...moisture in a shower. Assume it can be fixed with some super glue or silicone....just have yet to put it back on the shower head. Hopefully it is not a precursor to other internals being sub par. One would hope not....it's a Speakman.
customer_reviews.author: JDUB

customer_reviews.title: Spa at home experience every time!
customer_reviews.text: This is far better quality than a Delta shower head. It feels definitely like a spa experience everytime I take a shower now. The Speakman showerhead is made of really good quality materials. It feels heavier than other mostly plastic showerheads in the market today. This looks tough and strong. The flow of water is perfect. I've read other reviews on this before buying. I was surprised on how some reviewers complained on the slow flow of water due to the restrictor washer. My suggestion---Buy this showerhead. The flow of water is perfect. You will get a like spa experience or or feel like you are in a 5 star hotel taking a shower everytime you us it.
customer_reviews.author: Domoarigatomrrobotto

customer_reviews.title: Great showerhead - you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: This showerhead has been great! We tried several others before this one (from cheap to spendy) and ended up returning them all because they didn't give us the powerful yet adjustable spray we wanted. Like several other reviewers, we did end up removing flow regulator. I used a needle-nose pliers and didn't have any trouble removing it. I wasn't super impressed with the flow before removing it, but it's great after removal! The showerhead itself is fixed, but you can adjust the amount of flow, which is great because my husband and I like it on different settings.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality Shower Head
customer_reviews.text: PROS: *the water comes out nicely. Big Fat Rain Drops *easy to install *easy to adjust *heavy, brass parts, looks like it was made in the 1940s. Maybe it will last a good while? *does seem kind of expensive, but we'll see. If it lasts 20 years, maybe not. CONS *the retard is hard put in there. you have to destroy to remove it to get the sizzle water stream. It should be like other shower heads, easy in, easy out. *I wish it had a water volume adjuster like other shower heads instead of a permanent throttle. Bottom line: I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis BarringtonTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: This is the one you want
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I this excited about a showerhead. I've really been missing out for the last 47 years. I already bought another one for our other shower. All metal construction. This thing is heavy and well built. I didn't know they still made things like this anymore. Much better than the plastic crap they sell in the big box stores. The stream pressure is adjustable and it doesn't have any of those useless gimmicky massage modes. I've got mine set at full pressure. Really feels good on the old joints and I actually feel cleaner. Also has a very simple design that looks very nice in my opinion. One of the best purchase I have ever made.
customer_reviews.author: elnuttero

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT A POWERFUL STREAM!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I AM SO DISAPPOINTED. THIS PRODUCT WAS ADVERTISED AS A HIGH FLOW, POWERFUL SHOWER HEAD. I PURCHASED TWO AS I HAVE USED THE SPEAKMAN PRODUCTS BEFORE AND HAVE A DUAL SHOWER HEAD IN MY SHOWER. HOWEVER THIS PRODUCT IS HIGH QUALITY, BUT NOT STRONG FLOW! EVEN AFTER ADJUSTING THE HEADS MULTIPLE TIMES, IT STILL ISN'T A STRONG STREAM... DISAPPOINTING TO SAY THE LEAST. I AM GOING TO RETURN THIS... NOT AS ADVERTISED!
customer_reviews.author: santa clause

customer_reviews.title: Great but not life changing
customer_reviews.text: After reading so many reviews on the life changing nature of this product, I can now say that I like it quite a bit but it's not life changing. Seems to be a nice shower head and can output quite a bit of water with the restrictor removed. I'd probably buy another but maybe would also try another brand too. I'm on well water so that could be a reason maybe my pressure isn't where it needs to be. Big upgrade though from my previous showerhead. Style is nice and feels heavy with lots of quality. The adjustment knob basically goes from a soaker setting to fine Jets, again nice but there's really only two settings to use.
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: These last a year at most.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought them a few times. Nicest flow, easy operation and decent looking but the warranty sucks. they collect calcium and lime quickly, the SS plate at the front rusts, and the interior of the articulating fitting rusted and they somehow wriggled out of a warranty replacement. Too expensive to last less than a year.
customer_reviews.author: benedetto

customer_reviews.title: Just Excellent Shower
customer_reviews.text: Bought a new house, builder grade showerhead is ok, but not great. Stayed in Marriott Courtyard 2 weeks ago. Liked the showerhead, wrote down info, and ordered it. This showerhead is great, bought 2.5 gpm. Excellent installation instructions, even came with plumbers tape!!! Does everything the description says. Good value for money...
customer_reviews.author: Campbell1951

customer_reviews.title: Nice but....
customer_reviews.text: For all of the hoopla surrounding the reviews I read I suppose I was expecting more than I received...or am I missing something? Is it probably the best built, heaviest shower head I have ever installed (and I've probably done at least a dozen in search of the perfect flow)? By all means, but I don't understand all of the hype. The one reason I bought it-allegedly kick butt flow-I have yet to find. Of note, I haven't tampered with the flow restriction device yet but I didn't think I should have to on a product this nice. If anyone has any ideas, I'm wide open. Especially since I have waited too long and cannot return it any longer.
customer_reviews.author: STLricky

customer_reviews.title: Not made in US as the incorrect Q&A implies
customer_reviews.text: Many Q&A says made in US but the box I received (see photo) says made in China. And the unit has lead. Paying $79 for a China made showerhead is way overpriced. As Amazon already selling a lot of Speakman knock off (I have seen “SpeakmEn” in Alibaba. What do you expect? Making it in China they immediately copied your best selling model and sell them for $20. I may return it as this China made one is 3 oz lighter than my old US made Speakman. May be the factory there swap some brass parts with plastics.
customer_reviews.author: FishnMore

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, however, the package was open and it was loose inside the bag. I was concerned because it is very small, fit in the palm of my hand and I have small hands. It is heavy and seems to be made well. Installed quickly and overall it is a good product. I like the water pressure to be harder and this is not up to par with my preference but it gets the job done. If you are looking for a showerhead that has a stronger water pressure you may be disappointed. I think its too expensive for what we got.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel A Martin

customer_reviews.title: WOW...Five Stars is not enought
customer_reviews.text: Five stars are not enough. Out of the box, this thing has great flow and super pressure. IT is a heavy and contains real metal, unlike the majority of the plastic shower heads. If the little black o-ring should somehow get displaced or fall out during installation, there would be water flow the likes of which have not been seen since the government started to regulate our showers, flushing our toilets, and washing our clothes.
customer_reviews.author: NAK

customer_reviews.title: BEST SHOWER HEAD EVER- BUT PLAN ON A HIGHER WATER BILL!
customer_reviews.text: This shower head was exactly what I was hoping for. Very solid construction and stoutly made, I expect it to last many years. My wife was constantly complaining about a lack of pressure in all our showers to wash her hair- problem solved! Removed the flow restrictor (very easy) resulting a torrent of water pouring through this thing. There's a little lever on the side and changes the flow from a flood of heavy water (think Niagara Falls) perfect for washing long hair to a spray of tiny individual high-pressure streams that will blast the top layer of your skin off.
customer_reviews.author: Tactical geek

customer_reviews.title: Quality Down the Drain
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been a Speakman customer for 30 years, installing their shower heads whenever I moved to a new house. Nothing ever compared to their quality and forceful flow. Well, sad to say, that recommendation is kaput! This new showerhead (over $100) is marginally better the cheap Delta showerhead it replaced. Even removing the water restrictor made no difference in the water force. In short, one of two things may have happened: either the showerhead is a forgery or SPEAKMAN has drastically cut its quality. (Btw, the water pressure in my new house is good....but this new shower head is just bad)
customer_reviews.author: bianca

customer_reviews.title: Quality shower head
customer_reviews.text: It's entirely made of metals (aside from the nozzles and water restrictor) so it is quite heavy, I expect it to last a very long time. It also comes with a small roll of teflon tape, so for those who don't have any, you won't need to spend more for one. The handle rotates 360 degrees and there are about 3 different settings. Switching it to "intense mode" makes the water colder for some reason. I really like how smooth the water comes out no matter what it is set to. I can wash much faster, and in my opinion is also perfect for shaving. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Our Speakman Shower head will not move
customer_reviews.text: We have used Speakman shower heads for many years and this on is the third that I can remember. Very disappointed. We cannot get it to swivel. Differing heights of our family members necessitates a swiveling shower head for comfortable use. This shower head will not budge from its original position. Very uncomfortable. We really like it except for its stubborn positioning.
customer_reviews.author: BollyNita

customer_reviews.title: Easy install. Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Big fat gorgeous Speakman water drops. Grew up in a Mid-Century that had classic 50's Speakmans all around. Simply none better. I even pulled them and brought them with me as an adult. Had encountered cheaper not nearly as good spearman's in hotels & thought the brand had fallen off. Then I ordered these to replace the ones I had from my childhood home. Removed the flow filter & BAM! these are sweet. Entire household was "Dad why didn't you do that sooner?" After three months I still look forward to showers. Showerhead shopping can be overwhelming, its difficult to try before you buy. These are a classic. Couldn't be more pleased. Likely you will be as well.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality but not high velocity.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent build quality. Excellent fit and finish. My complaint is that it's supposed to be a high velocity head. It is not. Even after removing the flow restrictor, water flow through the head is anemic at best. I understand they have to comply with government regulations limiting GPM, but there are ways to increase the velocity of the water. This is not that type. However, if you want a very solidly constructed and attractive shower head, you'll be very happy with this one.
customer_reviews.author: C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great shower head if you remove the restrictor!
customer_reviews.text: We just remodeled our bathroom and put 2 of these in. I was about to give this a 3 star rating after I used it for the first time because the water pressure was really horrible. But then, I remembered seeing that you could move the water restrictor. Not sure why some folks have had a difficult time (one guy said he had to use a drill!), but we found it fairly easy to remove using a nut pick. I use the tightest setting and it feels like standing under a waterfall. My husband prefers the opposite end of the spectrum. Looks really nice with my Moen ORB fixtures, too.
customer_reviews.author: Sybrash

customer_reviews.title: It's great, but...
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint about this shower head is how wide the spray pattern is. It's not necessarily a problem, but I have a standard bath/shower combo in my home. If I stand in the middle of my shower area, the spray pattern hits both the wall and shower curtain on each side of me as well. The dial/knob/lever can adjust the spray pattern to give more of a "soak" option, if you've ever used a garden sprayer, which narrows the stream, but it also alleviates the pressure of each jet of water. I suppose you can't really have your cake and eat it too.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Wright

customer_reviews.title: Speakman 4 Life!!
customer_reviews.text: Will never purchase another brand of shower heads for the rest of my life! The shower head is phenomenal. Not only the water pressure if second to none (w/o tampering with water regulator inside head) but is also made in the USA. Will always pay an extra dollar for a company that supports my neighbors, friends, and families. Quality product that doesn't break the bank and can tell will last for years to come! Took my wife and I several different shower heads at department stores, glad will never have to have the problem again of a subpar head that delivers weak water pressure and worthless features.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Szymanski

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shower head
customer_reviews.text: Best shower head you will ever have if your water pressure is good. I stayed at a hotel in San Francisco and they had this shower head. What a great shower, strong jets but not painful. I came home and purchased one immediately. Make sure to get the one with six jets if you have strong water pressure. Otherwise, get the smaller ones to maximize water stream.
customer_reviews.author: L. R. 4

customer_reviews.title: Best. Shower. Head. Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t think it would be able to create a powerful stream out of nowhere but it did for sure. Before my shower was a place I was annoyed to go but now my showers don’t last long enough. Before I would have to spin constantly to have my body receive some water. Now I barely have to move to get water where I need it. Has flow levels from piercing laser jet streams to thick waterfall-type flow and everything in-between due to its design there is no setting #1,2,and so-on. It’s a spin of the handle and you can customize the flow. Well-worth the money. Showers have become sexy. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never ever thought a shower head would impress me.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! We bought a home with well water, first time ever. The existing shower heads would literally drool on you, it was the most pathetic thing I've ever seen. The water flow/pressure out of the lower tub section came out rapidly and with what would seem enough force to allow a shower head to flow well. I researched around and found out about the Speakman, I was actually giddy after the first shower, couldn't wait for my wife to try! Ended up buying another for the second bathroom, and it looks like they'll last my lifetime! Solid, heavy pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Maestro

customer_reviews.title: Lovin' it!
customer_reviews.text: To quote a burger maker of note, I'm lovin' it!!! My old shower head was adequate but getting long in the tooth so I took a chance with the Speakman and am thrilled! We have more than adequate water pressure here at the house so I expected a strong flow - and got it. I only need to turn on the flow to about 50% and get plenty of force. The individual streams of water are almost stinging and about perfect. Not only am I cleaned by the time I step out but totally refreshed and tingling. The perfect experience! And I did not have to tinker with the flow restricter to get it.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Shower head works great, but the details matter when you spend this much
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shower head, and works really well for those with less than stellar water pressure. The adjustment is smooth and the finish looks great. HOWEVER, the face plate of this shower head fell off as soon as I removed it from the box. Had I spent 15 bucks on this, I would chalk it up to being a cheap item and let it go. This thing costs a hundred bucks. Its "premium", so I have higher expectations. I expect the fit and finish to be there, and not to have to reattach the face plate when its brand new.
customer_reviews.author: The Worlds Foremost Expert Authority On Everything

customer_reviews.title: Pressure loss slowly over a year/removed the internal water saver
customer_reviews.text: *update-removed the flow regulator inside with needle nose pliers(not readily removable, you have to break apart) and now it is a mini-Niagara falls/ serious power pressure washer. Now 4-stars, 5 if the water saver was easily removable and instructions were included for the option to remove it for maximum flow. You may want to adjust the 🚿 as too keep water from splashing everywhere and creating mold. Hope this helps;) Strong at first...a year later unsatisfying pressure..so not recommended, poor durability. I did soak in water and white vinegar solution for days, but with no noticeable improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nearly perfect item.
customer_reviews.text: This was the second Speakman shower head I've bought. The first I had for over 25 years and loved so much I moved it into every apartment I've ever had, six in total. They last a long long time and they work perfectly. Especially after you take out the flow restrictor. If you like taking showers you will not ever regret getting a good shower head. There are a few things I've learned over the years not to skimp on. Among them are a good mattress and a good shower head. Buy a good one and you'll understand why.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E.

customer_reviews.title: Average 1.75 gpm
customer_reviews.text: Average shower head for the cost. I do not find the pressure of this head to be any greater than the head I bought from my local energy provider that it replaced. At it's highest pressuer setting it spreads the water in a rather large circular pattern. In my case, I also noticed that this high pressure setting restricts the hot temperature of the water coming through the head. When adjusted down the water pattern is closer and the temperature becomes hotter. Strange. It's an attractive head and it functions fine but not worth this much money.
customer_reviews.author: Doplar

customer_reviews.title: Superb - Once Flow Restrictor Is Removed
customer_reviews.text: With flow restrictor installed this unit is only average. With it removed you get 40%+ flow and it’s great. To remove pry out the tiny black gasket, then remove the (white) Teflon restrictor by drilling a small screw into one of the restrictor little holes and pulling the screw out. You may have to drill two holes, but the restrictor which is kind of tough to pull out, will come out. Simple as that.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD LOPES

customer_reviews.title: Best shower head yet.
customer_reviews.text: This is the same type you will find in hotels. This is a heavy duty brass shower head that should last forever. Not a plastic piece of crap like cheaper models. If you remove the small plastic water restrictor in the shower head, you should have the pressure you desire. I have a well and this shower head blasts the water just like in a hotel. My wife complained other shower heads weren't strong enough to rinse shampoo from her hair. Installed this and no more complaints!
customer_reviews.author: John Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Low shower pressure? BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.text: I encountered this shower head at a hotel I stayed at. The second I got home I bought 3 for friends who have complained about low water pressure from their shower heads. These shower heads blow the soap right off of you. Some of my friends even had plumbers tell them that their pipes were the problem. Once they installed this shower head, they were more than satisfied. If you have low pressure at home, try these before calling a plumber!
customer_reviews.author: D. Navarro

customer_reviews.title: A Real Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: After completing a bathroom renovation and being disappointed with our newly selected rain shower head, I researched the BEST showerhead with the best pressure. This model was highly recommended but has been a real disappointment. This showerhead does not pivot at the base so you cannot adjust the angle. Although it is advertised at 2.5 gallons per minute, I find that doubtful. We will be using this as a guest room shower head and beginning a new search for a showerhead with more flexibility and water pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Once I removed the flow restrictor... Gitty-Up!
customer_reviews.text: When I first used this shower head I was not too impressed. However, once I removed the flow restrictor... Gitty-Up! I simply pulled the restrictor out with needle nose pliers. There are plenty of online videos on how to remove restrictors. I have both the You.Mee handheld and the Speakman together with a two way diverter (all without flow restrictors). It's an amazing combo. Not only does the shower feel amazing but I physically feel cleaner after the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Sagepipe

customer_reviews.title: Good Weight, Forceful Stream of Water, Professional Look
customer_reviews.text: An amazing showerhead at a fair price. I especially liked the choice of different showerheads which deliver different amounts of water - from 1.5 to 2.5 gpm. I was looking for something that produced a forceful stream of water and this Speakman does just that. It is a good weight, unlike the plastic or tin models found in the stores and it looks professional. Simple to install. I'm not a plumber, but removed the old showerhead and installed the Speakman in about 15 minutes using only the plumbing tape supplied and an adjustable wrench. No leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Ken

customer_reviews.title: Not gonna lie; it's worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I was a wee bit dubious while either shopping for a replacement golden showerhead or something else cheaper. I even got some cleaner to soak the old one in to get rid of the hard water deposits. So after adding that juice to my cart, I eyeballed this thing again. I started considering it an investment in making my mornings the best they could be. My wife <3 this thing more than I expected. All I have to say is when we sell this house, we're taking our speakman with us.
customer_reviews.author: J. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great pressure. Easy to adjust. Sturdy build.
customer_reviews.text: I have been through 3 shower heads in the past 2 years. The first was a bargain buy and it lasted about a month. Then, I went for a $150 eco-friendly low-flow and unfortunately, if there are any pressure drops, it barely flows. I searched online and found a list of the top 5 shower heads and then watched videos on them all. This one won my pick and HOLY COW--it works exactly as expected. The easy adjustment dial is amazing and the stream is wonderful. It came with tape for installation as well..not sure if it said that in the description. Big time winner. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: M_R

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic showerhead.
customer_reviews.text: One of the first things I always do when moving into a new apartment is to replace the showerhead. Unless they already have one of these, which is never the case. Not only is it a wonderful feeling being massaged by powerful water streams, you're also saving water using a high-pressure showerhead. The only thing I don't like about this specific model is how angle widens as you switch to high-pressure mode. I'd rather have a narrower flow, but not really a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Linh Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: A good shower head
customer_reviews.text: After using the shower head for a month, I am a little disappointed. I have another Speakman in my guest bathroom that is the "hotel" model. It is much larger and has a much more powerful spray. This shower head is like a "needle shower" which is good for massaging the back, But, I still think the larger head with center spray is more versatile even though it only has three settings. The head is so small that is makes the shower look less luxurious. It just is a shower head and that's about it. Buy one of the hotel models and you will be happy!
customer_reviews.author: Fabritzio Fineburg

customer_reviews.title: Nice design and construction
customer_reviews.text: This showerhead has a solid heft of metal, unlike a lot of the plasticy things sold these days. I first installed it as sold and was disappointed with the output. Once the limiter was removed, it gives a very nice shower with good water pressure. It should last for decades.
customer_reviews.author: GearGuy

customer_reviews.title: Water pressure trick!
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching a while for a good high pressure shower head. The last 3 I purchased said they had it, but was nothing impressive at all so I figured I needed to up my price range. Initially, this shower head did not have anything over the $20 shower head I tried before it. Then I removed the rubber O ring....and OMG. I finally found the high pressure I had been searching for! Remember, remove the black O ring before installing. It's super tiny so best to just cut it out. I promise you...night and day difference in pressure. This trick didn't work on the cheaper heads.
customer_reviews.author: Monty Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great Shower Head, but too good?
customer_reviews.text: This shower head is AWESOME and was what I really thought I had been looking for. I would recommend it to anyone who wants an invigorating shower! Sadly, I am returning it. This shower head is really powerful and as such it moves a LOT of air in the shower. Unfortunately it moved so much air that we couldn’t contain the shower curtain! It was floating all over and water was escaping the tub & shower unit. I’d highly recommend that you have shower doors and not a hanging curtain in order to utilize this shower head.
customer_reviews.author: Billiesman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, excellent, excellent! If you want cheap, this is not your product.
customer_reviews.text: I believe the speakman , is excellent! If you want cheap, this is not your product. You really get what you pay for.Speakman is probably one of the better. Excellent showerhead. Very satisfied with the quality and performance of the showerhead. Speak man does make a better which must be fantastic because this is better than excellent. Highly recommend this. Simple to install. I feel it’s much much better than the conventional large head showerhead. At 2.5 gallons per minute, it’s great In that many family members can take showers with enough hot water in your hot water tank and not totally drain it. Great shower pressure! Great head.
customer_reviews.author: Gaspsr1517

customer_reviews.title: Try it a week then let someone try to take from you.
customer_reviews.text: So far, nothing to dislike. I replaced a larger, round, choice of spray patterns head. At my house, the water pressure is good but with too many distribution points open on the head, the amount of water targeted to the body was spread too thin to be most effective. This head is a quality item in every respect and I recommend it. The price is higher but so is the value. I appreciate it more every time I shower.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Hibdon

customer_reviews.title: Love this Shower Head!!! Will not use anything else.
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed how heavy the head actually was when I took it out of the box. It has a very solid construction and it was installed in less than 5 minutes which included taking off the old shower head. I’ve already had 3 showers in less than 24 hours because I love how the water feels and the increased pressure and washing power. The head adjust to three different settings and my skin feels so good when I’m out of the shower. I absolutely love this product and will only ever use this in the future. It gets my highest recommendation!
customer_reviews.author: Mark LaCoursiere

customer_reviews.title: Can take the chrome off a car bumper!
customer_reviews.text: Holy crap! This thing spits out so much water, my bath tub started filling up (Draino took care of that problem). If you are familiar with and love the pressure of hotel showers, then this is for you. If you want the full monty, ensure you remove the water restricting “O” ring before installing.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Look no further.
customer_reviews.text: This is the shower head you are looking for! It's actually made of metal and took an old shower spigot that felt like a fine mist and turned our shower into a firehose! (that might be an exaggeration, but it's wonderful). My husband and I dispute over the size of the preferred stream, but it's easy to adjust with the handle on the side, so we can easily both be happy. We didn't have to take out the ring either to get the better pressure. I'm in a 3 story townhouse with the water heater in the basement. This was exactly the shower head we needed. The brushed nickle is a nice color too that doesn't require constant cleaning/polishing.
customer_reviews.author: LAD

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Shower head - Lots of Water Flow
customer_reviews.text: Im so glad I upgraded to this shower head. It produces a nice heavy flow of water and the head is made of solid brass. It is so hard to find fixtures in solid brass these days! I was lucky to find this shower head on Amazon. It matches perfectly with the current brass fixtures in my upscale bathroom. You just can't find this kind of quality at the mass home improvement stores. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: A. Levenson

customer_reviews.title: This model does not have high power spray
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with this model. Stated it was high power spray but its not......and we even removed the water saver.. The Different setting are not that different from each other........strange. Also where we live we already have good water pressure so it must be the product. Also when changing setting the water temp changes to colder temp.....weird. I think I will look around for another brand.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Better than old shower head
customer_reviews.text: Our old shower head was a great Kohler water fall, but just not enough pressure. However. With a thick head of hair it took time to completely rinse shampoo. We liked the water fall, but decided we really wanted more water pressure so ordered the Speakman in brushed nickel. Never had to take out the ring to increase water flow, strong flow just as it is. We are completely happy with the shower head.
customer_reviews.author: Foxy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: YouTube was wrong
customer_reviews.text: I have been on the hunt for the best high powered shower head for quite some time and this was rated #1 on various sites and videos, I had recently purchased and underwhelming WaterPik from Walmart. I tested the flow from the shower itself which was about 4.5 - 5GPM, removed the seal and regulator from this shower head and fired it up, the pressure is decent enough but the few spray settings don’t take advantage of that pressure. I was able to take a decent shower by changing the settings multiple times for coverage of various areas, this was a hard learned $70 lesson. Buyer beware I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Schatz

customer_reviews.title: absolutely fantastic
customer_reviews.text: My wife absolutely loves loves loves this shower head. It has produces and really nice jet of water at all different settings with plenty of water of pressure which was a problem in our Mountain well system home.Taking out the water saver ring is a bit of a pain (as others have commented on here in other reviews). You will need to find a tool that will be small enough, but yet strong enough to pry out the water saver ring.
customer_reviews.author: New York

customer_reviews.title: Six Nozzles Are Just Right
customer_reviews.text: The reason we bought the Speakman shower head was that there are very few alternatives in the brushed bronze finish we wanted. After two months we are very pleased. The six-nozzle head delivers a flow of water in configurations from sharp to soft with a moderate spread. We originally purchased the eight-nozzle model (and returned it for a defect), but we found its highly disbursed water stream with a very wide spread unsatisfying. We were puzzled by other buyers' talk of removing the water restrictor in the head. The 2.5 GPM model out of the box gives us plenty of water.
customer_reviews.author: southcoastfred

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with product
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with product. Good flow and is adjustable from heavy stream to fine spray. Sturdy construction, and no problems after a year. I DID find it necessary to remove the flow restrictor to get a skin-obliterating spray. I have decent pressure in my building (high rise apt). Unlike claimed in description, the nozzles will clog up with hard water scale, just like any shower head. Was satisfactorily cleaned by soaking in vinegar. Recommend highly over cheap plastic shower head.
customer_reviews.author: Potato Sun

customer_reviews.title: Speakman doesn't stand by their product...moved manufacturing to China, doesn't pivot easily
customer_reviews.text: I've had a few of these showerheads. The last one I received wouldn't pivot at all without an immense amount of pressure (enough to break pipe / cause problems). I called Speakman and an engineer was like "oh yeah, we did notice that, hopefully it'll loosen up." They said they couldn't do anything for me at all. 75$ paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I spent close to $100 on the one I bought - the finish matches my other hardware in the bathroom. I spent a lot of time researching high pressure shower heads. I almost bought the $150 version - but glad I didn't. The one I bought is $50 less and is rated by consumer group as better. You can find cheaper ones that probably ok. The Speakman is one of the best. Installed in 53 seconds. It's extremely powerful. My pressure before was squat.
customer_reviews.author: jmason

customer_reviews.title: Finally, we have shower pressure!
customer_reviews.text: We replaced our Mohen shower head with this one because our other shower head didn't even have half of the usual pressure most have. This specific shower head is awesome and it feels great to finally have some shower pressure!
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Watson

customer_reviews.title: Oh Speakman, my Speakman!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Speakman. We left our other one at our old house, I hope the new owners are appreciating it. This makes showering fun again. Great water pressure, lots of nice water. One can actually rinse one's hair. It's real metal, nice and heavy and you know it's worth its price. Not some horrid schlocky fake chromed plastic piece of yuck you get at a big-box store.
customer_reviews.author: TheVintageVegan

customer_reviews.title: but I thought it might help--this name Speakman seems to be some sort of legend--I have no idea why except it is a beautiful object and clearly well-made
customer_reviews.text: I don't write many reviews on Amazon, but I thought it might help--this name Speakman seems to be some sort of legend--I have no idea why except it is a beautiful object and clearly well-made, BUT IT SUCKS, because it produces lousy pressure, period. I replaced a decades old shower head that did a far better job, but recently 'stopped working--it was so old it came with our house... but it was far, far superior and nothing fancy... An American Standard... If you are looking for great pressure, do not get this Speakman. That's about it. I give it two stars for its aesthetics, but its performance is 1 star. Returning it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty with average spray
customer_reviews.text: It is definitely heavier than the average showerhead. The brushed nickel matches other fixtures I have. The flow is strong (with the restrictor removed). But not is not massaging strong on any of the settings. Most of the settings seem useless. I found myself only using one which is fine but not exceptional. I think some cheaper plastic showerheads are available with better spray options.
customer_reviews.author: Curt M

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Nothing is special about this shower head. The pressure wasn't any better than my old cheap shower head. I even tried taking out the water saver ring. Unfortunately life got busy and the return time expired. Save your money and try a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Leaked
customer_reviews.text: Speakman customer service says the new model (that I received) no longer requires a rubber gasket in the neck...but I can tell you it does. Could not get it to stop leaking after several attempts. Leaking aside, it delivers a nice strong broad steam shower experience. Would like to have kept it. Installed the old shower head in less than a min without any leaking. Returned product.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Great pressure and coverage
customer_reviews.text: We don't have a lot of water pressure. After renovating our bathroom and buying a fancy showerhead, it felt like I saw showering in one of those camp showers that you put a quarter to get three drops of water. After researching, we purchased this showerhead and now it's like I'm showering in a spa. It's wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Janine F

customer_reviews.title: Test flow pressure first!
customer_reviews.text: Speakman shower heads are the absolute best available. I've always had one. I remodeled two bathrooms, one with Pfister and one with Moen. Neither shower head was satisfactory - even after taking out the flow restricter. With the Speakman, I left the flow restrictor in and it had as much pressure as the others but with a better spray. So I will advise to test this shower head before tampering with it! Even with the restrictor in, a lot of water is coming out.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Ciancio

customer_reviews.title: Don't like to gush, but....
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a very expensive two head shower "system" with this pretty basic adjustable shower head. WOW! I will never replace this. Great volume of water in a variable spray---from fine to just gushing water. If you don't have an exact water flow in mind, this is the one. The variation of water flow is almost endless. You can find that perfect flow for you. I did!
customer_reviews.author: William Rau

customer_reviews.title: An exceptional product. I removed the black o-ring gasket ...
customer_reviews.text: An exceptional product. I removed the black o-ring gasket to get more pressure but really did not have too, I may even put back in. No comparison to old shower head. I have about 50 psi in my water system and separate volume and temperature controls for the shower. The old head I would turn volume to max and it was still weak, with the new head I only turn volume on 50% and have twice the pressure at shower head.
customer_reviews.author: SLeo

customer_reviews.title: The shower head from your High School gym has better pressure
customer_reviews.text: Bought this showerhead because the top reviews said it had awesome water pressure. After installing it and getting about the same as my previous shower head, which was meh, I read more reviews that recommended taking out the water restrictor. After doing so, it was still junk for the pressure. It is well made, so there’s that. However, not worth the $ that I paid.
customer_reviews.author: NJ

customer_reviews.title: Great flow
customer_reviews.text: Quality metal shower head. Works like everyone says. My only comment is to dispute that it is hard to adjust. Sure it is a stiff ball joint, but I had no problem moving it around - no Hercules here. So the reviews that say set it and forget trying to readjust are more than a little dramatic. I find the nozzle adjustment while it works, when opened up wide for flow it's kind if useless and dialed in tight a little too fine for me. But that's true for all these shower heads and I find these heads with 3-6 options all fairly useless like massage etc.
customer_reviews.author: menk1

customer_reviews.title: Love this shower head
customer_reviews.text: Love this shower head! My boyfriend was skeptical about it and made a stink about installing it but guess who is eating crow now! Yep, after you had have poor water stream you realize how important a good shower head is. This shortens my time in the shower especially when shampooing your hair and actually saves water! If we move this little baby is comin with!
customer_reviews.author: silvi

customer_reviews.title: The Screaming Eagle of shower heads....phenomenal water pressure after removing the restrictor. But it now!
customer_reviews.text: Got it and two weeks ago to replace a Moen sprinkler head that was giving us a rather feeble output. I wanted heavy pressure from the head. Upon delivery, I followed the instructions to remove the water-restrictor....even using a needle nose pliers, the restrictor was really wedged in there, so most people say take a small screw and twist it into the center of the restrictor....then use the pliers to grab it out. The method works just fine. After that it took about two minutes to remove the old shower head, wrap the plumbers tape, and install the 2252. God, the pressure is amazing.....you'd think you're standing in a hurricane. Buy the 2252 and you'll never be without one again.
customer_reviews.author: John in Houston

customer_reviews.title: Good Solid Shower Head
customer_reviews.text: I love this shower head. I have had it installed for over a year without any issues. I did follow the recommendation of other reviewers and removed the water reducing gasket so I get higher water pressure coming out of the shower head. It is solid and heavy not like some other cheap plastic shower heads I have purchased in the past. If I am looking to replace another shower head with this style then I will probably look for this model or a similar model from Speakman.
customer_reviews.author: booklover

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: We've been through so many shower heads in the 15 years we've lived in our house and could never find one that really did what we wanted. So many showers we felt like we had to scrub the soap off of ourselves. Now that we have this shower head we have finally found what we were looking for. There is great pressure and coverage and our shower feels like a luxury now.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bain

customer_reviews.title: Good - with some modifications
customer_reviews.text: I've used Speakman Shower Heads for years. After 15 years, one of the shower heads started to leak. After installation of the S-2252, the pressure was ok, but the water flow was insufficient. After removing the white water re-stricter, the water flow was much better. It seems like the design has been modified over the last decade or so to meet CA requirements.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: questionable
customer_reviews.text: After examining all comments...I Decided on this over the S-2251......maybe I am expecting TOO much, but I don't feel the "hard/intense" pressure I was looking for, that everyone says is awesome, it not there......it is a good showerhead, but I still wanted it to be" greater!" Some say there is an o-ring that can or cannot be removed to increase pressure.,...I do not see it. Can anyone enlighten me???
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: It is a great piece of equipment for your shower!
customer_reviews.text: Like the look and the weight of the Speakman shower head. It is not the first one I have ever had. When we have moved into a new home, we have kept what was there UNTIL we get complaints about other shower heads... we go get a Speakman to replace them. They have a great adjustable spray and are easy to clean! They have never disappointed us!
customer_reviews.author: Rowanne C Uselton

customer_reviews.title: Commercial Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Standard installment, no problems. Works fantastic. Deluge of H2O falls right down near my tub drain, great for hair washing. Reach up, twist of the adjustment for a super shower spray. I tried a bunch of chrome shower heads. Funny when you hear chrome you think metal, nope, a bunch of them were plastic. Again, the Speakman is nothing but quality. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: LONG LIVE AWESOME SHOWERS!
customer_reviews.text: Changed my life. Dull and weak water pressure made me believe that showering was a punishment from the gods. Parts of my body would be warm under the water - others cold. I installed this and have not left the shower since. I am in the shower right now. I will never leave. I have chosen my life's path because of the Speakman Anystream. LONG LIVE AWESOME SHOWERS!
customer_reviews.author: Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not quite what I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: I guess peoples definition of high pressure varies. Although this head has nice pressure, with the water reducer removed, it's not what I was hoping for. Been to hotels with "high" pressure and this isnt one of them. I do like the spray pattern and the pressure but was hoping for something higher. The best I have seen so far seem to be those with aerators.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Love how sturdy this is and seems like it won't break down as quickly in hard water. Wish I ordered the one that can move once installed but this is great for my 3x4' shower.
customer_reviews.author: daradv

customer_reviews.title: OMFG
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I got the 2.5gpm head and hooked it up. Meh..not too impressed. Took it off, screwed a wood screw into the flow restrictor and yanked it out. Hooked it back up. Hoooooly crap! It was Niagara Falls! My shower curtains were blowing in the wind that the water was creating. The spray at full blast is like a mix of water stream, high pressure droplets and steam all in one. The spray width is slightly wider than your body so you get sprayed everywhere at once. Feels amazing. Bought a second one just because.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Burgins

customer_reviews.title: Made a significant difference!!
customer_reviews.text: We had purchased a new home in California. Knowing how the state regulates a lot of things having to do with water use, we thought that it was normal to have a lower water pressure in the shower. but we wanted to make sure there wasn't anything else we could do to improve it so after reading all the reviews we bought the Speakman shower head. It made a significant difference in the way the water comes out of the shower and it's so much better now. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: I have tried them all over the years since I built custom homes and my clients were used to better products. Since I started usi
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a shower head, look no further. I have this model in every bathroom in my house. Nothing else on the market compares to the Speakman Anystream. I have tried them all over the years since I built custom homes and my clients were used to better products. Since I started using the Speakman, I never once had a complaint even from those who complained about everything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not enough pressure
customer_reviews.text: There is not enough pressure; the range is not very adjustable; it's either medium pressure, or low-pressure trickling. I'll donate it and buy another, probably one of the older models which aren't made anymore. UPDATE: I bought a couple of new Speakman Icon Luxury Hotel heads on eBay for less than half the price each, and I am much happier. It seems the feds have regulated it out of existence.
customer_reviews.author: lk

customer_reviews.title: Great water flow/pressure
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a 1.75 GPM piece of crap that that came with our new house. Not enough water to take a decent shower. This head is priced right, heavy gauge metal and works wells. Not as broad a spray as the larger square heads, but it's a powerhouse and housing isn't made of plastic. Loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Great for showering the walls and shower curtain
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this, but the spray is just too wide in a small shower. It does an excellent job of cleaning the walls and shower curtain of my tub-shower, but so much water is wasted on those that could have gone to shower ME. Returned it for a Wassa brand. At 1/4 the price, it actually sends all the water to me, not the walls.
customer_reviews.author: I. Dean

customer_reviews.title: IT REALLY WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY, "a shower head that WORKS" like it says it will! First, let me say that I installed this shower head myself in under 5 minutes with no issues at all. Upon testing for any leaks, there were none. Let me preface by saying that I have extremely LOW WATER PRESSURE at my home, so so with other shower heads using a pulsing level of water on the face actually hurt; not any more!!! Upon actual usage of the shower head, again, no leakage; the adjustment of the water is easy, workable, and feels wonderful. You would never know how my home had low water pressure. I'm extremely pleased and recommend this product highly.
customer_reviews.author: POPO MAMA

customer_reviews.title: A work of Art
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I took it of the box and felt it's weight, I knew it would be a winner--and after a 5 minute installation it did not disappoint. Rotate the side handle --360 degrees in either direction--through 6 distinct water flow settings. You won't want to come out of the shower!
customer_reviews.author: JRN

customer_reviews.title: Pure Bliss
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. It has been many years since I had a satisfying shower. This has changed. It is not that simple to remove the water restrictor. My neighbor, who is a genius at all things mechanical, did spend about 15 minutes to remove and chip away at it.
customer_reviews.author: Markji

customer_reviews.title: Great showerhead!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome showerhead. It can definitely take a low pressure source and output high pressure water. I live in an apartment and when I move, I always take this with me and replace the low quality shower heads they use with this one. I need to buy a second one for the guest shower.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: In a class by itself!
customer_reviews.text: In this day and age, cheaply made and inferior quality seems to be the norm. Fortunately, this shower head bucks the trend. Made of solid brass, it is substantially heavy and exudes quality. The control lever on the side glides easily in either direction moving the rubber grommets further or closer to the shower head until you've found the perfect stream. Don't waste your time anymore with those cheap plastic stream adjusters that get stuck full of mineral deposits after a while. You've tried the rest, now try the best!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Best Shower Head I’ve Ever Bought
customer_reviews.text: Searched through Amazon and Google to find the best shower head. I think I found it! I absolutely love this one. Well built. Awesome pressure. Easy to install. Easy to adjust the water flow. I’m so glad I did my research. I would definitely buy think one again and highly recommend it. I’ve gone through quite a few shower heads after 45 years of home ownership. I think this will be my last!
customer_reviews.author: KitKat

product_meta.title: Speakman S-2252 Signature Icon Anystream Adjustable High Pressure Shower Head-1.75 GPM Solid Brass Replacement Bathroom Showerhead, Polished Chrome, 2.5
feature_bullets: ICONIC STYLE: This solid brass shower head has clean lines and a modern faucet design with simple side handle to complement any contemporary bathroom hardware and accessories.
ANYSTREAM TECHNOLOGY: The adjustable shower head’s patented Anystream 360° system effortlessly transitions the water spray through Intense, Rain and Full Flood settings.
EFFICIENCY & POWER: Shower head plungers control the spread of water as it leaves the nozzle to intensify the stream, making it an ideal low water pressure showerhead.
LOW MAINTENANCE: The replacement showerhead’s self-cleaning plungers resist hard-water buildup and sediment making the faucet easy to clean and maintain.
SPEAKMAN PLUMBING: From commercial plumbers’ supplies to bathroom accessories to fall in love with, Speakman delivers quality, innovation and performance with every product.
